author: IGN
description:
Sandfall Interactive has shadow dropped a brand new content-filled free update for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 with patch 1.5.0, also known as the Thank You update. Let’s go over everything they added in this new DLC.

Patch Notes:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1903340/view/491585297311596633

author: IGN
description: Check out 15 minutes of Pragmata, as featured in the "Sketchbook" demo, available now on Steam. Pragmata is a new sci-fi third person shooter that features two main characters that must be used simultaenously in combat. Your android companion Diana uses her real time hacking abilities to slow and debilitate enemies, while Hugh uses his firepower to take them down.
title: Pragmata Gameplay - Sketchbook Demo Full Playthrough

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

Leon S. Kennedy is now officially confirmed for Resident Evil: Requiem, but don't expect just a simple cameo from him. Capcom developers have clarified how much of the game will be from Leon's POV, and just like his first outing in RE2, it looks like about half the game will have you playing as him. The other half will be played out via Grace Ashcroft, but there's a very strong possibility you'll have at least one more character to play as. In other news, Clair Obscur almost had a clean sweep at last night's Game Awards, winning 9 of 11 nominations. As a thank-you to fans, developer Sandfall has made the upcoming DLC not only available right now, but it's totally FREE. And finally, take a peek at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter at Universal Orlando Resort.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Here's How Much Leon S. Kennedy Is In Resident Evil: Requiem - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
title: This is STAR WARS: Galactic Racer™. Coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S & PC in 2026

author: IGN
description:
Watch as Reze tries to teach Denji how to swim in this Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc clip for the animated film. Based on the hugely popular anime series, Chainsaw Man continues in an all-new epic, action-fueled adventure. Amid a brutal war between devils and hunters, another battle starts in Denji’s heart when he meets a mysterious girl named Reze. Facing secret enemies and fighting for his humanity, Denji revs up for his deadliest battle yet. Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc is directed by Tatsuya Yoshihara. Based on the original story “Chainsaw Man” by Tatsuki Fujimoto (Serialized in Shueisha’s “Shonen Jump+”). The screenplay is by Hiroshi Seko. Production by MAPPA.

Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc is available on digital now.

#IGN #Anime
title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc - Official Pool Clip (2025) English Subtitles

Don't miss 'The Reckoning' Update Trailer for Witchfire, a first-person dark fantasy extraction shooter developed by The Astronauts. Players will be introduced to the World Corruption, a brand-new gameplay implementation that evolves the map with high-risk, high-reward mechanics. A new Melee Weapon system and more await in 'The Reckoning' Update for Witchfire, available now for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 received a surprise free content update the moment it won Game of the Year at The Game Awards, adding a brand-new playable area called Verso’s Drafts along with a suite of late-game challenges. This video walks you through exactly how to access the new zone, what prerequisites you need to meet, and how the update expands the game with new encounters, features, and rewards.

For those searching for how to find Verso’s Drafts in Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, this guide covers reaching Act III, unlocking Esquie’s diving ability, locating the whirlpool entrance near Lumiere, and navigating the new post-launch content. We also break down the update’s new weapons, costumes, photo mode, Endless Tower boss rematches, and other high-level additions to help returning players and newcomers quickly access everything included in the patch.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - How to Start the DLC (Verso’s Drafts Location)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Story Tease' Featurette for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Hear from Zoe Saldana and Oona Chaplin on what to expect in the third installment of the Avatar franchise. Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona Chaplin, Clif
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Zoe Saldaña, Oona Chaplin

author: IGN
description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 now has a new endgame area called Verso's Drafts. It's located just to the East of Lumiere, and is filled with new enemies, Pictos, and even more surprises.
title: Expedition 33 - 16 Minutes of New DLC Area Gameplay (Verso's Drafts)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Beyond Frontiers' Cinematic Trailer for Rust Mobile, a mobile yet expanded version of the hit open-world multiplayer survival game developed by Facepunch Studios. Players will take the fight with some levity in between the incoming gunfire and chaos, all while making good use of limited resources to survive. Rust Mobile is coming soon to iOS and Android, with a Closed Beta available now.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Rust Mobile - Official 'Beyond Frontiers' Cinematic Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Trailer for Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, an action RPG based on the hit anime developed by Netmarble Neo. Players will rise from E to S Rank as Sung Jinwoo in an original story. Make use of an array of weapons, attacks, and more in Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, available now for PC (Steam and Xbox on PC), with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive - Official Gameplay Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

title: Forest 3 - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Call of Duty dev team has issued a statement basically acknowledging Black Ops 7's shortcomings and promising to move off the back-to-back yearly release of mainline Call of Duty games. This comes as Black Ops 7 was met with middling reviews and apparently worse sales numbers in the face of stiff competition this year. EA's Battlefield 6 and Embark Studios' ARC Raiders both launched around the same time and were met with widespread acclaim. Black Ops 6 was released only last year, and Modern Warfares 2 and 3 were also released in back-to-back years, leading many fans to complain each entry did not feel or play substantially different from the previous year's. In other news, two new games are being added to December's PlayStation Plus lineup: Assassin's Creed Mirage and Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty. They join the recently-released skating game Skate Story.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty Will Stop Back-to-Back Releases of Black Ops, Modern Warfare - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The latest leak for Ubisoft's still-unannounced Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake may have revealed the game's official title. Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced appeared on the PEGI ratings website, but has since been pulled, lending credence to the title's legitimacy. Ubisoft has yet to confirm its existence, but a previous financial results presentation teased an unannounced game for March 31, 2026. In other gaming leaks news, the PlayStation store may have revealed a major franchise character returning to Resident Evil. Art for Resident Evil Requiem features Leon S. Kennedy prominently along with new character Grace Ashcroft. Kennedy has not been featured in a mainline Resident Evil game since Resident Evil 6 back in 2012. Expect a proper reveal at The Game Awards later this week.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreed
title: Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced Is the Remakes Official Title - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Check out the Official Trailer for CRKD Nitro Deck 2, a standalone pro-style controller attachment developed by CRKD. Players can expand their feature set and comfort with the CRKD Nitro Deck 2, compatible with the Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch OLED, and Nintendo Switch 2. The CRKD Nitro Deck 2 is packed with desirable additions to the base console, including extra bumper buttons, a built-in rechargeable battery, swappable sticks, adjustable vibration, and more. The CRKD Nitro Deck 2 is available now for pre-order and will ship in Spring 2026.
title: CRKD Nitro Deck 2 - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
GameStop held its 'Trade Anything Day' promotional event where customers could come in with (almost) anything and get cash or store credit. GameStop shared with us some of the craziest trade-ins, such as a taxidermied bobcat, some McDonald's socks, and—get this— a Netflix Wii disc from way back when the Wii needed an authentication disc to stream content from the Netflix app. Did you try to trade anything in an GameStop? How much did you get for it? Let us know in the comments. In other news, fighting game legend Katsuhiro Harada is leaving Bandai Namco. Harada had been with the Tekken franchise for 30 years, working on each installment and directing Tekkens 3 through the recent Tekken 8. Harada has not yet said what he'll do next.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN
title: GameStop's 'Trade Anything Day' Was Wild - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Check out the Reveal Trailer for Alt+F4, a puzzle adventure game developed by Skeleton Corp. Players will explore a labyrinth where every “Exit the Game?” confirmation window is no longer a way out, but a movement system. Pressing Yes or No moves you up, down, left, or right. Find gold, pay a debt, or get a rematch in Alt+F4, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Alt+F4 - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this multi-level gameplay of Terminator 2D: NO FATE, we'll be blasting through Level 10 'Freeway Chase', Level 11 'Steel Mill' and Level 12 'Future War: Retaliation', featuring Sarah Connor and the T-800, along with John Connor in the future, fighting in the front lines as mankind's only hope in the War Against the Machines. 

00:00 - Freeway Chase
02:56 - Steel Mill 
06:27 - Future War: Retaliation

Terminator 2D: NO FATE is out now on PS5, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC (via Steam and the Epic Games Store).

Choose your oath, and leap into battle. Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred will be available on April 28, 2026. Pre-purchase of the Diablo 4: Lord of Hatred expansion instantly unlocks the Paladin class.

Manage energy and oxygen sources with up to three players and make critical decisions before all is lost. Resonant Q is launching in 2026 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

author: IGN
description:
A new Star Wars game from Casey Hudson? The sequel to Control from Remedy? A first look at Larian’s first new project since Baldur’s Gate 3? This year had it all! Let’s run through all of the trailers and reveals that we saw today, including a sneak peak at the Street Fighter movie, first looks at Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic, Divinity, Mega Man Dual Override, two new Tomb raider games, and release dates for Phantom Blade 0, Arknights Endfield, Pragmata, and much more!

Step into the cursed world of Ailur in a new teaser announcing the official release window for Kristala—launching Q1 2026 on PC and console. Developed by Astral Clocktower Studios and currently in Early Access on Steam, Kristala is a dark fantasy action RPG where players must master punishing combat, uncover ancient magics, and rise to join ranks with Ailur’s most elite warriors.

Wishlist Kristala today and follow the studio’s ongoing development journey as they prepare for a full 1.0 launch in Q1 2026.

author: IGN
description:
Vegelypse is a hand-painted 2.5D beat ’em up with roguelite grit, animated frame-by-frame for maximum punch and personality. Join the Hard Rock Cacti Band, four anthropomorphic, rock-shredding succulents whose jam session gets crashed by a truckload of rabid root vegetables. Instruments down. Spines up. It’s go time.

Fight solo or team up in 1-4 player co-op. Pick your prickly powerhouse and battle your way from the peaceful countryside to the fire-scarred heart of the city as you race to stop the Vegelypse at its source.

Wishlist on Steam today! 🌵🎸

#IGN #Gaming
title: VEGElypse - Official Announcement Teaser

author: IGN
description:
Back by popular demand, CRKD and IGN are happy to announce that the Nintendo Switch 2 will get the same accessory treatment as Switch 1 with the Nitro Deck 2. Iterating on the original Nitro Deck, CRKD Nitro Deck 2 will come with a slew of improvements to performace, comfort, connectivity, and absolutely no stick drift. We sat down with the creators of the Nitro Deck 2 to gets hands-on with it and discuss all the new features that come with it. Nintendo Switch 1 owners fret not, as the Nitro Deck 2 is fully backward compatible with the original Nintendo Switch and OLED models.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Introducing The CRKD Nitro Deck 2 For Nintendo Switch 2

Lost Skies is coming to Xbox and PlayStation in Q1 2026! The 6-player co-op multiplayer survival game is also available on Steam right now:

Chart a course in a breathtaking, but fractured world. Explore ancient ruins, master advanced technology, and craft your very own skyship to brave nature’s fury and colossal threats in Lost Skies. Team up with up to 5 friends or go it alone in this awe-inspiring cooperative survival adventure.

Orbitals is coming exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026.

There will also be an all-new open field, new daunting challenges of The Crucible, and the ability to "transcend through time to survive the cursed kingdom across the ages of Japanese history." Nioh 3 will be released on February 6, 2026, and will have a demo available on January 29, 2026.

description:
Watch the No Law announcement trailer for this upcoming first-person open-world shooter RPG set in the gritty cyber noir city of Port Desire. In No Law, step into the boots of Grey Harker, an ex-military veteran who left his war-torn past behind for a quiet life tending his plants until trouble finds him again. When his peace is violently shattered, Harker must rely on his black-ops instincts and custom hardware to take back what was stolen and confront the city that wronged him. No Law will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S.

Lara Croft is back in Tomb Raider: Catalyst, a brand-new entry in the beloved series that will debut in 2027. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Tomb Raider: Catalyst - Official Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis, a reimagining of the 1996 genre-defining game. 
 
 As Lara Croft, harness your wits and athleticism to explore exotic locations lost to time—from the jungles of Peru to the ancient ruins of Greece, the deserts of Egypt, and a mysterious Mediterranean island shrouded in myth. Traverse treacherous landscapes, solve deadly contraptions, and face lethal predators as you hunt for the scattered pieces of the Scion, an artifact of immeasurable power.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Tomb Raider Legacy of Atlantis - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025

author: IGN
description:
Two years after its reveal, we finally get a new look at Exodus, which has resurfaced with a 'Indiana Jones-Meets-Interstellar' type adventure vibe we are very excited about. This new sci-fi action-RPG from Achetype Entertainment is from Wizards of the Coast and explores the accelerated evolution of human and alien civilizations, and we get to decide the fate of different factions and humanity within the warring galaxy. Oh, and Matthew McConaughey will be playing a pivotal character in the story.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Exodus – Official Gameplay Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
After much speculation, this brand new gameplay and story trailer for Resident Evil Requiem confirms that Leon S. Kennedy will be joining Grace Ashcroft as a playable character. We get a look at him in action, including seeing him wield a chainsaw and deal some wonderful revenge. Resident Evil Requiem will be released on February 27, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Resident Evil Requiem - Official Leon Gameplay and Story Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Bradley has been a beloved platforming character for a long time, but now things are a bit different. Now Bradley is in a different type of game. Transform the game with the godlike powers of a game developer, explore... very familiar worlds... and make it home in one piece in this 3rd person action-adventure from Day 4 Night studios. Bradley the Badger is coming to Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Bradley the Badger - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Baldur's Gate 3 developer Larian Studios has revealed Divinity, which it is calling its "biggest game ever," and it puts to rest the mystery of what the statue was for in the desert. You can get a first look at the upcoming game, but be warned, it is a very brutal first look. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Divinity - Official Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Starring award-winning actor Stellan Skarsgård, Ontos is a spiritual successor to Soma. This sci-fi thriller begins as a search for answers that becomes something much more, something much stranger, delving into the nature of reality - and your place within it. Ontos comes to Xbox, PS5, and PC in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Ontos - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Say hello to Coven of the Chicken Foot from Wildflower Interactive, a game all about an elderly witch who quietly goes back to work after all the dungeons have been plundered and the monsters have been killed. This “emotionally-rich, stylized, single-player adventure” will see Gert needing to form a bond with a “peculiar creature” to fulfill a coven’s oath.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Coven of the Chicken Foot - Official Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
John Carpenter's Toxic Commando gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Check out the latest John Carpenter's Toxic Commando trailer for the upcoming ’80s action-horror-inspired co-op shooter game. John Carpenter's Toxic Commando will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC on March 12, 2026.


In the near future, an experimental attempt to harness the power of the Earth’s core ends in a terrifying disaster, turning soil to sludge and the living to undead monsters. Leon Dorsey, the genius behind the experiment, had a plan to make things right: hiring a team of highly trained mercenaries to get the job done. Unfortunately, they were all too expensive. That’s why he hired THE TOXIC COMMANDOS.


Tag team with up to 3 buddies—with full crossplay support across PC and consoles. Send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld as you drive across semi-open maps and tear through the wasteland. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwar
title: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando - Official Release Date Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Star Wars: Fate Of The Old Republic is a new, single-player, narrative-driven action RPG, and the spiritual successor to Knights of the Old Republic. Arcanaut Studios, led by Casey Hudson, game director on the original Star Wars: Knights Of The Old Republic, leads the charge on bringing on this epic adventure, coming to PC and consoles.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Star Wars: Fate Of The Old Republic - Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

description:
Stupid Never Dies is set in a world where monsters are part of everyday life, and you take on the role of Davy, a lowly zombie who must brave a dungeon to bring back Julia, a frozen human he loved. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Stupid Never Dies - Official Reveal Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
In the near future, Hugh and his android companion Diana, must work together to get through a luna research station in this new science fiction action adventure game where you hack enemies during combat. Pragmata comes to PC, Xbox Series X/S, PS5, and Switch 2 April 24th 2026.   

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Pragmata - Official Demo Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Solasta 2 gets a new trailer revealing its cast and an early access release date announcement. Watch the latest Solasta 2 trailer for this upcoming turn-based RPG sequel based on tabletop RPG systems. The new Solasta 2 trailer gives us a peek at combat and the story as we meet the cast, which features the voice talents of Amelia Tyler (Baldur's Gate III, Hades II) as Shadwyn, Ben Starr (Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Final Fantasy XVI) as Rickard Colwall, Devora Wilde (Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Baldur's Gate III) as Deorcas Colwall, and Ellen Thomas (Arcane) as Anabasia. Solasta 2 enters into Steam Early Access on March 12, 2026.

Bound by a covenant left unfinished by their late mother, the siblings find themselves drawn into an ancient conflict that threatens to consume their world and unravel their family. Alongside their elder siblings, Rickard and Deorcas, they must navigate loyalties strained by grief, faith tested by darkness; with each step forward revealing how thin the line
title: Solasta 2 - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
In TankRat you become Whitaker, a Sleepwaker who is a digitized consciousness inhabiting a Needle, or a hardened drone that is meant to endure the storms and horrors of the ECA. You must exploit their weaknesses to take them down and destroy everything if you hope to survive. Scavenge, dismantle, and rebuild yourself from the wreckage in this fast-paced, brutal vehicular action adventure game.

 #ign #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: TankRat - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
If you haven't played Guild Wars 2, now is the time. Jump in now and become part of Tyria's 20 year history. Guild Wars 2 is free, and you can play it now on Windows and Steam. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Guild Wars 2 - Visions of Eternity Official Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
DESC: You play a sheepdog, who needs to heard your flock through a beautiful countryside, rain or shine. Something strange is happening, and only you can stop, so get the sheep to safety and face the calamity. The Free Shepherd comes to PS5 and Steam in 2027. 

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: The Free Shepherd - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Decrepit announcement trailer for the upcoming dark fantasy first-person souls-like game from developer Jämmerdal Games and publisher Three Friends. The Decrepit reveal trailer showcases terrifying enemies you'll face in a dungeon-crawling adventure. Decrepit will be available on PC in 2026.

In Decrepit, every death drags you back to the dungeons below, stripped of all equipment. Armed with only the knowledge gained from each escape attempt and whatever you can loot from undead inmates and guards, the only path out is learning the castle’s layout before it kills you.

Inspired by classic first-person action games like Hexen, dungeon crawlers like Eye of the Beholder, and modern souls-likes, Decrepit emphasises spatial mastery over power creep. Keen-eyed explorers will find hidden secrets throughout the castle that provide permanent bonuses. Helpful, but never a replacement for knowledge and execution.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards2025
title: Decrepit - Official Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2025

author: IGN
description: After being left at the altar in Rome, a man decides to go on his honeymoon alone.
title: Solo Mio - Official Trailer (2026) Kevin James, Alyson Hannigan, Kim Coates
